name: BowmanVSZombies
description:
BowmanVSZombies: Kill, Survive, Level Up!In this game, you need to survive to differents waves of zombies, which are more and more difficult! Be careful, Boss can also spawn! Each game will help you unlock power-ups, worlds, ... and Achievements!


  • Different Zombies
  • Different Boss
  • Different Worlds
  • Power-Ups
  • Leaderboard
  • Steam Achievements
  • Points earned for each kills
  • Full skill tree system with points
  • Other cool stuff ...


  • More zombies, more boss, more worlds!
  • New character?
  • Give me your ideas! Check how to contact me below.
